data.message:
It's been a long time for me to work with angular, but check this : 
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/17319645/angularjs-change-filter-options-dynamically

When u get stuck with something, it's always faster and better to isolate the problem and put it in plunker or jsfiddle , so someone can fix it and provide a working example.
To be honest, I can't read the whole app repo and figure out the problem and try to fix it or any can I believe
